trans_examp.trans_en: a piece of paper, plastic, or other material that covers and protects something
a loose piece of clothing that is worn in the house, sometimes over other clothes

dsense.name: wrapper
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a financial product that gives advantages such as reduced tax
trans_examp.trans_cn: 包管账户（一种财务产品，可获得避税等好处）

example.eg: The shares will be held in a tax-free individual savings account wrapper.
example.egtrans: 股份将通过免税的个人储蓄包管账户持有。
